bioconda.name: bioconductor-xde
bioconda.summary: XDE: a Bayesian hierarchical model for cross-study analysis of differential gene expression

biotools.summary: A package for estimating differential gene expression from different studies with technological differences to improve the statistical power of gene expression studies.

bioschemas.name: XDE
bioschemas.summary: A package for estimating differential gene expression from different studies with technological differences to improve the statistical power of gene expression studies.
